text: As a site reliability engineer, design a chaos engineering framework. Include: fault injection mechanisms, blast radius control, automated rollback, and observability integration.
Implement a feature flag system with gradual rollout capabilities, A/B testing support, and real-time configuration updates without deployment.
Create a multi-tenant SaaS architecture with tenant isolation, resource quotas, custom domains, and per-tenant configuration management.
Design an event-driven architecture using AWS EventBridge. Include event schemas, routing rules, dead letter queues, and cross-account event delivery.
Build a serverless data processing pipeline using AWS Lambda, Step Functions, and DynamoDB. Handle error retries, idempotency, and cost optimization.
